channel.title: Ubuntu Application Review Process on
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu Application Review Process on

item.title: Clearing the FUD around Ubuntu Application Review Process
item.description: An application review process was announced today for getting your apps into Ubuntu “extras” repository. But like most other announcements of new things, this one was met as well with as much criticism as the praise it got. A lot of the criticism is FUD though, although mostly unintentional and caused by ignorance of some facts behind it. I’ll try to address some of these concerns here to the best of my knowledge from what I’ve been reading over the past some time about this development.
